Articles.Content:
I'm getting lots of crashes today doing absolutely routine things such having mechjeb execute a burn or switching to the tracking station. 

Yeah, I have far far far far too many mods, but for the past few sessions, the game has lasted all day until today when it's been awful. =\ I update my mods continuously so maybe I should have been more attentive...
